info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 6:17PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Elbert and western Lincoln Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 616 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Matheson to 8 miles southwest of Forder, or along a line extending from 13 miles west of Limon to 46 miles north of La Junta. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Limon, Kutch, Forder, Punkin Center and Matheson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
